OverallGame

Class OverallGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • OverallGame.OverallGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OverallGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Since:
    2015-11-02 Handles the screen for all of the games The player will be able to chose which game to play from this screen
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Brendan, Danielle, David, Huayu and Zhanglong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Animates the map containing the game locations Players can click on a game to start it Players can view the high scores and exit the game If the player sits idle for too long, the game will restart

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Animates the map containing the game locations Players can click on a game to start it Players can view the high scores and exit the game If the player sits idle for too long, the game will restart

      • onClick

        public void onClick(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        This method will start the game that the player picks or will exit the game if they click the exit button
        Parameters:
        e - - a Mouse Event (click) from the user that will determine their action
